name: Reconsider
description:
Ellie, a magical girl who takes her power from butterflies, has the power of changing the thoughts of people around her. She uses her power very generously, but after she started delivering packages as a government employee, something has changed. Chaos rose very rapidly around her, and all of a sudden, she had a thought: “Was she being used for something?”

-If you like the game and want to see more please let us know.  Also, we would like to know if (when) you encounter any bugs (features).  You can use the comments or e-mail us via: pungocorp@gmail.com
